title: Vampire Medium Dark Skin Tone
description: A person dressed as a vampire with medium-dark skin tone, often depicted with fangs, a cape, and a pale complexion. It can represent Halloween, gothic themes, or mythical creatures.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this vampire emoji embodies a chilling elegance with its medium-dark skin tone rendered in Apple's signature glossy 3D style.  Its sharp, captivating eyes and subtle, confident smirk suggest a timeless mystique, while the soft, rounded edges of its hair and cape add a touch of refined detail.  This emoji on Apple devices is perfect for conveying a sense of playful intrigue, dark humor, or a touch of the supernatural in your digital conversations.
